projectShortDescription: Your task is to produce highly accurate transcriptions of speech combined with annotation mark-up. We will provide you with Guidelines for how to transcribe and annotate the audio.
projectLongDescription: This project requires stable internet connection, strong attention to detail, understanding of basic linguistic concepts, good reading comprehension skills in English, ability to review examples and apply rules to data, familiarity with spelling conventions in US English, native/near-native knowledge of US English, prior experience with transcription, and prior experience with annotation of acoustic data.
languages:
Japanese - Japan
English - United Kingdom
French - Canada
Spanish - US
budget: IC US Eng LCL: $4/br, XRT ASR Assisted: 4.5, Team Size: 11, Total Hours: 162, Total: $648
locationOfAudio: Client's S3 bucket, we do read-only once manifest (source file with links to wav and txt on client's bucket) is uploaded
